section.title: Minifier
section.para:
Minifier allows you to minify javascript sourcecode into a compact distributable form. It is a PHP5 port of JSMin by Douglas Crockford.
JSMin is a filter which removes comments and unnecessary whitespace from JavaScript files. It typically reduces filesize by half, resulting in faster downloads. It also encourages a more expressive programming style because it eliminates the download cost of clean, literate self-documentation.

note.para: The performance of this minifier is not very good compared to the C version; however, it works fairly well for small scripts and cached implementations.
